subsection_content: Diabetic retinopathy is a diabetes complication that affects the eyes. The disease occurs due to damage to the blood vessels of the retina. At first, diabetic retinopathy may cause no symptoms or only mild signs of vision loss. But in the long term, the disease can cause blindness. The longer people have diabetes, the higher their risk of eye complications. (first)
subsection_title: benh vong mac tieu duong.json. What is diabetic retinopathy?
subsection_data:
benh vong mac tieu duong.json. What is diabetic retinopathy?
Diabetic retinopathy is a diabetes complication that affects the eyes. The disease occurs due to damage to the blood vessels of the retina. At first, diabetic retinopathy may cause no symptoms or only mild signs of vision loss. But in the long term, the disease can cause blindness. The longer people have diabetes, the higher their risk of eye complications. (first)
